nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, Jedi Masters Obi-Wan Kenobi and Adi Gallia undertook a mission to the planet Bray after the native Brayans asked the Jedi Order for help. While on Bray, the Jedi discovered the presence of both Count Dooku and Lord Ravna, leading to a confrontation that ended in Ravna trapped beneath the ruins of the Citadel of Light and the Brayans freed from his power.
